A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons. | | udor | `'date'` | Date of origination in UTC | | udorLocal | `'date'` | Date of origination in local timezone | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | flightNumber | `'string'` | Flight number | | suffix | `'string'` | Suffix code | | departureAirport | `'string'` | Airport of departure | | arrivalAirport | `'string'` | Airport of arrival | | regId | `'string'` | Registration number of aircraft | | fuelEquipmentId | `'string'` | Equipment identification code used for fuelling | | operationType | `'string'` | The type of the fuel progress operation. Refer to IATA PADIS Code List. e.g. FPQ or FQQ | | operationSubtype | `'string'` | The subtype of the fuel progress operation. Refer to IATA PADIS Code List. e.g. ALC,DIS or POS | | scheduledFuelProgressDate | `'datetime'` | Scheduled date and time of the fuelling progress operation in UTC | | actualFuelProgressDate | `'datetime'` | Actual date and time of the fuelling progress operation in UTC | | handlerCode | `'string'` | The supplier that provides fuel services to the airline | | requestingFuelCarrier | `'string'` | The carrier code of the airline requesting fuel | | source | `'string'` | The source system from which fuel milestone data originates | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Fuel Summary Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :-------------------------- | :----------: | :------------------------------------------------ | | flightId | `'string'` | Flight identifier.
